35 namespace detail {
37 
62 template <typename InIter1, typename InIter2>
63 void find_common(InIter1 first1, const InIter1 last1, InIter2 first2,
64  const InIter2 last2, std::pair<InIter1, InIter1>& common1,
65  std::pair<InIter2, InIter2>& common2) {
66  common1.first = last1;
67  common1.second = last1;
68  common2.first = last2;
69  common2.second = last2;
70 
71  // find the first common element in the in the two ranges
72  for (; first1 != last1; ++first1) {
73  common2.first = std::find(first2, last2, *first1);
74  if (common2.first != last2) break;
75  }
76  common1.first = first1;
77  first2 = common2.first;
78 
79  // find the last common element in the two ranges
80  while ((first1 != last1) && (first2 != last2)) {
81  if (*first1 != *first2) break;
82  ++first1;
83  ++first2;
84  }
85  common1.second = first1;
86  common2.second = first2;
87 }
88 
89 template <typename VarLeft, typename VarRight>
90 inline Permutation var_perm(const VarLeft& l, const VarRight& r) {
91  TA_ASSERT(l.size() == r.size());
92  std::vector<size_t> a(l.size());
93  typename VarRight::const_iterator rit = r.begin();
94  for (auto it = a.begin(); it != a.end(); ++it) {
95  typename VarLeft::const_iterator lit =
96  std::find(l.begin(), l.end(), *rit++);
97  TA_ASSERT(lit != l.end());
98  *it = std::distance(l.begin(), lit);
99  }
100  return Permutation(std::move(a));
101 }
102 } // namespace detail

105 
109 class VariableList {
110  public:
111  typedef std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator const_iterator;
112 
114  VariableList() : vars_() {}
115 
117  explicit VariableList(const std::string& vars) {
118  if (vars.size() != 0) init_(vars);
119  }
120 
121  template <typename InIter>
122  VariableList(InIter first, InIter last) {
123  static_assert(TiledArray::detail::is_input_iterator<InIter>::value,
124  "VariableList constructor requires an input iterator");
125  TA_ASSERT(unique_(first, last));
126 
127  for (; first != last; ++first)
128  vars_.push_back(trim_spaces_(first->begin(), first->end()));
129  }
130 
131  VariableList(const VariableList& other) : vars_(other.vars_) {}
132 
133  VariableList& operator=(const VariableList& other) {
134  vars_ = other.vars_;
135 
136  return *this;
137  }
138 
139  VariableList& operator=(const std::string& vars) {
140  init_(vars);
141  return *this;
142  }
143 
144  VariableList& operator*=(const Permutation& p) {
145  TA_ASSERT(p.dim() == dim());
146  vars_ *= p;
147  return *this;
148  }
149 
151  const_iterator begin() const { return vars_.begin(); }
152 
154  const_iterator end() const { return vars_.end(); }
155 
157  const std::string& at(const std::size_t n) const { return vars_.at(n); }
158 
160  const std::string& operator[](const std::size_t n) const { return vars_[n]; }
161 
163  unsigned int dim() const { return vars_.size(); }
164 
166  unsigned int size() const { return vars_.size(); }
167 
168  const std::vector<std::string>& data() const { return vars_; }
169 
170  std::string string() const {
171  std::string result;
172  std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator it = vars_.begin();
173  if (it == vars_.end()) return result;
174 
175  for (result = *it++; it != vars_.end(); ++it) {
176  result += "," + *it;
177  }
178 
179  return result;
180  }
181 
182  void swap(VariableList& other) { std::swap(vars_, other.vars_); }
183 
185 
191  template <typename V>
192  Permutation permutation(const V& other) const {
193  return detail::var_perm(*this, other);
194  }
195 
197 
200  bool is_permutation(const VariableList& other) const {
201  if (vars_.size() != other.vars_.size()) return false;
202 
203  for (const_iterator it = begin(); it != end(); ++it) {
204  const_iterator other_it = other.begin();
205  for (; other_it != other.end(); ++other_it)
206  if (*it == *other_it) break;
207  if (other_it == other.end()) return false;
208  }
209 
210  return true;
211  }
212 
213  private:
216  void init_(const std::string& vars) {
217  std::string::const_iterator start = vars.begin();
218  std::string::const_iterator finish = vars.begin();
219  for (; finish != vars.end(); ++finish) {
220  if (*finish == ',') {
221  vars_.push_back(trim_spaces_(start, finish));
222  start = finish + 1;
223  }
224  }
225  vars_.push_back(trim_spaces_(start, finish));
226 
227  TA_ASSERT((unique_(vars_.begin(), vars_.end())));
228  }
229 
232  static std::string trim_spaces_(std::string::const_iterator first,
233  std::string::const_iterator last) {
234  TA_ASSERT(first != last);
235  std::string result = "";
236  for (; first != last; ++first) {
237  TA_ASSERT(valid_char_(*first));
238  if (*first != ' ' && *first != '\0') result.append(1, *first);
239  }
240 
241  TA_ASSERT(result.length() != 0);
242 
243  return result;
244  }
245 
247  template <typename InIter>
248  bool unique_(InIter first, InIter last) const {
249  for (; first != last; ++first) {
250  InIter it2 = first;
251  for (++it2; it2 != last; ++it2)
252  if (first->compare(*it2) == 0) return false;
253  }
254 
255  return true;
256  }
257 
258  static bool valid_char_(char c) {
259  return (c >= 'a' && c <= 'z') || (c >= 'A' && c <= 'Z') ||
260  (c >= '0' && c <= '9') || (c == ' ') || (c == ',') || (c == '\0') ||
261  (c == '\'') || (c == '_');
262  }
263 
264  friend void swap(VariableList&, VariableList&);
265 
266  std::vector<std::string> vars_;
267 
268  friend VariableList operator*(const ::TiledArray::Permutation&,
269  const VariableList&);
270 
271 }; // class VariableList
272 
274 inline void swap(VariableList& v0, VariableList& v1) {
275  std::swap(v0.vars_, v1.vars_);
276 }
277 
278 inline bool operator==(const VariableList& v0, const VariableList& v1) {
279  return (v0.dim() == v1.dim()) && std::equal(v0.begin(), v0.end(), v1.begin());
280 }
281 
282 inline bool operator!=(const VariableList& v0, const VariableList& v1) {
283  return !operator==(v0, v1);
284 }
285 
286 inline VariableList operator*(const ::TiledArray::Permutation& p,
287  const VariableList& v) {
288  TA_ASSERT(p.dim() == v.dim());
289  VariableList result;
290  result.vars_ = p * v.vars_;
291 
292  return result;
293 }
294 
296 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const VariableList& v) {
297  out << "(";
298  std::size_t d;
299  std::size_t n = v.dim() - 1;
300  for (d = 0; d < n; ++d) {
301  out << v[d] << ", ";
302  }
303  out << v[d];
304  out << ")";
305  return out;
306 }
